opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States

opinion:
510 U.S. 941

Nebraska
v.
Wyoming et al.

No. 108, Orig.

Supreme Court of United States.

November 1, 1993.

1

Motion of the Special Master for award of compensation and reimbursement of expenses granted, and the Special Master is awarded a total of $59,566.79 for the period October 16, 1992, through August 31, 1993, to be paid as follows: 30% to be paid by each Nebraska and Wyoming, 15% to be paid by Colorado, and 25% to be paid by the United States. [For earlier order herein, see, e. g., 507 U. S. 1049.]
